san-lo-mvu13:7: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || kṣetram iti ||
san-lo-mvu13:11: tāni niśamya vākyāni śāsanaṁ ca naravara ||
san-lo-mvu13:14: evam ukte āyuṣmāṁ mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || kiṁ punar bho jinaputra sarveṣu buddhakṣetreṣu utpadyanti samyaksaṁbuddhā utāho keṣucid eva utpadyanti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapaṁ gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu13:23: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapa āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || khalu bho jinaputra ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ yaṁ ekasmiṁ kṣetre dvau samyaksaṁbuddhau nopapadyanti iti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapaṁ gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣate ||
san-lo-mvu13:25: tat sarvaṁ paripūreti eṣā buddhāna dharmatā ||
san-lo-mvu13:29: tasmāt duve na jāyante ekakṣetre nararṣabhau ||
san-lo-mvu13:32: anāgatā atikrāntā saṁbuddhā ye ca sāṁprataṁ |
san-lo-mvu13:34: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || katamāni bho jinaputra samprati anyāni buddhakṣetrāṇi yatraitarhi samyaksaṁbuddhā dharmaṁ deśayantīti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapaṁ gāthābhir adhyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu13:42: tatra jñānadhvajo nāma śāstā śāsati prāṇināṁ ||
san-lo-mvu13:63: yathā saṁsāracakrasya pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:64: tathāiva lokadhātūnāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:65: atikrāntānāṁ buddhānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:66: praṇidhentāna bodhāya pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:69: tuṣiteṣu vasantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:70: tuṣitebhyaś cyavantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:71: mātu kukṣau śayantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:72: sthitānāṁ mātuḥ kukṣau tu pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:73: jāyamānānāṁ vīrāṇāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:74: jātānāṁ lokanāthānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:75: aṅkeṣu gṛhyamāṇānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:76: pādāni vikramantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:77: mahāhāsaṁ hasantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:78: diśāṁ vilokayantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:79: aṅkena dhāriyantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:80: upanīyamānānāṁ gandharvaiḥ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:81: pūrebhyo niṣkramantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:82: bodhimūlam upentānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:83: prāpnuvantānāṁ tathāgatajñānaṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:84: dharmacakraṁ pravartentānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:85: satvakoṭī vinentānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:86: siṁhanādaṁ nadantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:87: āyuḥsaṁskāraṁ utsṛjantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:88: nirvāyantānāṁ vīrāṇāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:89: nirvṛtānāṁ śayantānāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate |
san-lo-mvu13:90: dhyāpiyantānāṁ vīrāṇāṁ pūrvā koṭī na prajñāyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:92: kvacit kvacit ca saṁbuddho buddhakṣetreṣu dṛśyate ||
san-lo-mvu13:93: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || yadi bho jinaputrā ettakā samyaksaṁbuddhā eko ca samyaksaṁbuddho aparimitān satvā parinirvāpayati nanu acireṇa kālena sarvasatvān parinirvāpayiṣyanti | evam ayaṁ lokaḥ sarveṇa sarvaśūnyaṁ bhaviṣyati sarvasatvavirahita iti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapa gāthābhiḥ adhyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu13:99: paryanto bheṣyati satvānām iti uktaṁ maharṣiṇeti ||
san-lo-mvu13:100: evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo āyuṣmantaṁ mahākātyāyanam uvāca || ye ime bho  jinaputra satvā samyaksaṁbodhāye praṇidhenti te te katibhir ākāraiḥ ṣaṣṭhyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ saptamāyāṁ bhūmau vivartanta iti || evam ukte āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana āyuṣmantaṁ mahākāśyapam uvāca || dubhi khalu bho dhutadharmadhara ākārair bodhisatvā bodhāya praṇidhento ṣaṣṭhyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ saptamāyāṁ bhūmau vivartanti || katamehi dubhi || saṁjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyo ca spṛhayanti yasmiṁś ca kāle samyaksaṁbuddhā satvaparijñayā ahaṁ mahātmā śamīkaro tti devatāṁ satkṛtya avahitaśrotā śṛṇvanti || ye hi kecid bho dhutadharmadhara bodhisatvāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāyāṁ bhūmau vartamānāḥ saptamāyāṁ bhūmau vivartensu vivartanti vivartiṣyanti vā sarve imehi dubhi ākārehi vivartanti vivartensu vivartiṣyanti iti ||
san-lo-mvu13:101: evaṁ eṣā ṣaṣṭhī bhūmir bhavati teṣāṁ guṇavarāṇāṁ |
